article_title: Obamacare Makes Employer-Based System Even Worse

article_metadata.description: The cost of employer-based health insurance is continuing to climb. As a result, workers' take-home pay flatlines -- or worse, employers force their staffers to pick up more of the rising healthcare tab.
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
